docs.title: Getting Started
docs.summary: Install UIK packages, load tokens, and compose primitives and shell components.

docs.title: Tokens Reference
docs.summary: UIK tokens are the single source of truth for all visual values and component hooks.

docs.title: Baseline Support Matrix
docs.summary: Baseline classification of platform features used by UIK.

docs.title: Primitives Reference
docs.summary: Shadow DOM building blocks that read tokens and expose explicit contracts.

docs.title: Shell Patterns
docs.summary: Light DOM layout primitives that compose the UI into a consistent application shell.

docs.title: Patterns
docs.summary: Composed UI patterns built from primitives and tokens.

lab.title: Lab: Shell Patterns
lab.summary: Dogfood shell patterns with live controls that update the layout and status bar.

lab.title: Lab: Empty State
lab.summary: Try the empty state pattern with slotted actions and supporting copy.

lab.title: Lab: Section Card
lab.summary: Use the section card pattern to group related content and actions.

lab.title: Lab: Page Hero
lab.summary: Create a page hero with badges, summary, and control panel content.

lab.title: Lab: Command Palette
lab.summary: Use a command palette pattern to search and navigate the docs.

lab.title: Lab: Overlays and Feedback
lab.summary: Exercise dialogs, popovers, tooltips, and progress indicators.

lab.title: Lab: Menus and Menubars
lab.summary: Explore menu and menubar keyboard patterns.

lab.title: Perf Fixture: Shell Layout
lab.summary: Stable shell layout snapshot for Lighthouse audits.
